ComicInfo.Title: An Uneventful Night
ComicInfo.Summary:
COMBINER WARS FALLOUT! Because you demanded it—WINDBLADE and CHROMIA team up with ARCEE to put an end to the menace of the COMBINER WARS—but will they end each other first?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Casey W. Coller & Joana Lafuente | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Livio Ramondelli | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | James Biggie | 3 | RE | Convention Exclusive Cover | Sara Pitre-Durocher | 4 |
